item.title: MAJOR PROBLEM NEED HELP ASAP(not really major :S)
item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

Thanks Ill try it :S

[quote=“gunz4life, post:6, topic:223436”][quote author=wc4evandeva link=topic=293480.msg2361666#msg2361666 date=1217640576]
Erm I even set the playerrights >= 1 im not stupid it jsut stopped working :S
[/quote]
errr here a pickup command…:

[quote] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }
                        if (newItemID <= 18000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        } else {
                            sendMessage("No such item");
                        }
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        sendMessage("I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 995 1");
	}
		[/quote][/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 07:38:40 pm[/size][hr]Its not like saying my Admins are admins and they have crown next to name and im pretty sure the playerrights in there character files = 2

It still doesn’t work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 07:40:48 pm[/size][hr]Didn’t Work

item.title: MAJOR PROBLEM NEED HELP ASAP(not really major :S)
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

errr here a pickup command…:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String[] token = command.split(" "); int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]); int newItemAmount = 1; 
                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }
                        if (newItemID <= 18000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        } else {
                            sendMessage("No such item");
                        }
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        sendMessage("I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 995 1");
	}</blockquote>

item.title: MAJOR PROBLEM NEED HELP ASAP(not really major :S)
item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

For some odd reason my admins cannot do pickup only people with Playerrights of 3+ Can But they could do it before for some odd reason!!
Someone got any ways to fix this?

Owner
And
Co-owner~ Can still do it

[sup]}
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage("configured for silabsoft, pickup 00995 1 ");
}[/sup]
